DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether , GnRH agonist vitro fertilization ( IVF ) cycle , risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) , addition cabergoline hydroxyethyl starch infusion could decrease OHSS incidence severity .
DOC.brief_title: Cabergoline Hydroxyethyl Starch Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome Prevention
DOC.detailed_description: Women undergo IVF cycle GnRH agonist protocol , risk OHSS ( 20 follicle observe large 12 mm diameter and/or estradiol level 3000-5000 pg/mL ) . Slow infusion 500 ml 6 % HES follicular aspiration alone combine 0.5 mg cabergoline administration 8 day , start day hCG administration .
DOC.criteria: risk OHSS invite participate study age > 40 year
